headline: Assessing Republic Services (RSG) Valuation After A Steady Multi Year Shareholder Return Run
summary: Why Republic Services is on investors’ radar Republic Services (RSG) has been drawing attention after a steady run in its share price, with recent returns over the past week, month, and past 3 months prompting investors to reassess the waste management provider. See our latest analysis for Republic Services. The recent 7 day share price return of 3.85% sits on top of a 4.22% year to date share price gain, while the 5 year total shareholder return of 157.08% highlights how long term holders...
